      • stop

        public void stop()

        Should be called when the client needs to be stopped and the disconnect is initiated on this side. There are two situations where this should be done: - A game has ended - An error occurred

      • stopReceiver

      • close

        public void close()

        Closes the client without notifying any listeners. Prefer sc.networking.clients.XStreamClient$stop() to end communication properly.

        See Also:
        sc.networking.clients.XStreamClient$stop()
